articles.description: The key issues facing Gregor Townsend when Scotland head to Dublin in the final round of this year's Six Nations

articles.title: QPR man an underrated 'class act', says Warburton - West London Sport

articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: Michael Conlan speaks out from the hospital after stunning knockout defeat to Leigh Wood - Daily Mail
articles.description: Michael Conlan was up on all the judges scorecards before a hard left, followed by a furious flurry from Leigh Wood sent him through the ropes to the floor in a last-round knockout defeat.
articles.content:
Michael Conlan has broken his silence after his stunning knockout defeat by Leigh Wood in their world title contest on Saturday.
